body.section: Hierarchy ServiceHistory is a kind of BehavioralHealthAssessmentDomain

section.title: Description
section.p: Identifies the type of services provided to determine if frequent inpatient detox vs. on-going treatment is more prevalent. This section is used to determine the effectiveness of the various services.

stentry.p: This is a coded attribute describing the type of service that has been rendered to the client/patient that appears in this area of the behavioral health assessment.
